title: Traditional Medicinals Herbal Supplement, Organic, Spearmint, Tea Bags 16 ea
description: Used throughout time in foods and body care products, spearmint is known to refresh and enliven the spirit. Freshen up inside and out with this rejuvenating and distinctly spearminty tea, sourced in part from a collective of organic farmers in Egypt that works to enhance their quality of life.
